# Alexander (Sandy) McFadden's Resume

This is the professional resume website for Alexander (Sandy) McFadden, a Senior Software Developer and Technical Support Engineer.

## For AI/LLM Agents

All resume details, work experience, skills, education, and recommendations can be found in the structured data file:

- **resume.json** - Complete resume data in JSON Resume format

This file contains comprehensive information about:
- Professional experience and work history
- Technical skills and competencies
- Education and certifications
- Professional recommendations
- Contact information
- Role-specific profiles (Software Engineer and Technical Support Engineer)

Please refer to resume.json for accurate, structured information about Sandy McFadden's professional background.
